\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Report information of a tunable matrix object. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Handle the tunable sparse matrix object. This module implements the routines to handle the tunable sparse matrix object.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
Currently, only support a sparse matrix in C\-S\-R format.
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__Matrix__common_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-\_\-common.\-c}, \hyperlink{poski__Matrix__getset_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-\_\-getset.\-c}

Create a tunable matrix object in C\-S\-R format. 


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ptr} & C\-S\-R row pointers. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ind} & C\-S\-R column indices. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em val} & C\-S\-R non-\/zero values. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em nrows} & Number of rows. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ncols} & Number of columns. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em nnz} & Number of non-\/zeros. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em mode} & Copy mode in \{S\-H\-A\-R\-E\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-M\-A\-T, C\-O\-P\-Y\-\_\-\-I\-N\-P\-U\-T\-M\-A\-T\} for matrix creation routines. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em threadargs} & Threading model information. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em partitionargs} & Partitioning model information. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em k} & Number of explicitly specified semantic properties of a sparse matrix (ptr, ind, val). \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em ...} & Specified semantic properties $<property_1>, ..., <property_k>$. See poski\-\_\-inmatprop\-\_\-t.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A valid, tunable matrix object if success, or an error message otherwise.
\end{DoxyReturn}
This routine performs as follows\-: (1) error-\/check for the input parameters.

(2) collect the specified semantic properies.

(3) allocate the space for a new tunable matrix object, and initailize it.

(4) create the partitioned submatrices.

(5) clean-\/up the temporary stroage and return the tunable matrix object. \hypertarget{poski__MatrixHandler_8c_a00f5b2f886dbc3f7577b7a9fa078c3b4}{\index{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c@{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c}!poski\-\_\-\-Create\-Mat\-C\-S\-R\-File@{poski\-\_\-\-Create\-Mat\-C\-S\-R\-File}}

\hypertarget{poski__MatrixHandler_8c_a4d7948d03ba5b22351e435be8b8ed79d}{\index{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c@{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c}!poski\-\_\-\-Set\-Mat\-Subset@{poski\-\_\-\-Set\-Mat\-Subset}}

\subsubsection[{poski\-\_\-\-Set\-Mat\-Subset}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}int {\bf poski\-\_\-\-Set\-Mat\-Subset} (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{poski\-\_\-mat\-\_\-t}]{A\-\_\-tunable, }
\item[{const int}]{num\-Rows, }
\item[{const int}]{num\-Cols, }
\item[{const int}]{row\-Stride, }
\item[{const int}]{col\-Stride, }
\item[{const poski\-\_\-int\-\_\-t $\ast$}]{rows, }
\item[{const poski\-\_\-int\-\_\-t $\ast$}]{cols, }
\item[{const poski\-\_\-value\-\_\-t $\ast$}]{vals, }
\item[{poski\-\_\-subsettype\-\_\-t}]{subsettype}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{poski__MatrixHandler_8c_a4d7948d03ba5b22351e435be8b8ed79d}


Set a subset of non-\/zero values, specified as a clique or indexed list. 

This imitates the U\-S\-C\-R\-\_\-\-I\-N\-S\-E\-R\-T\-\_\-\-C\-L\-I\-Q\-U\-E Sparse B\-L\-A\-S standard interface. See p. 128 (Chapter 3) of the \href{http://www.netlib.org/blas/blast-forum/}{\tt B\-L\-A\-S standard.} A clique is typically how one defines an element for matrix assembly in the finite element method.

If insertion of any entry of the subset does not succeed, the entry is not changed.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em A\-\_\-tunable} & \mbox{[}in/out\mbox{]} The tunable matrix object. \\
\hline
{\em num\-Rows} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Number of rows in the subset. \\
\hline
{\em num\-Cols} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Number of columns in the subset. \\
\hline
{\em row\-Stride} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Stride between rows of vals. \\
\hline
{\em col\-Stride} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Stride between columns of vals. \\
\hline
{\em rows} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Row indices of the subset. \\
\hline
{\em cols} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Column indices of the subset. \\
\hline
{\em vals} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Dense matrix storing the subset entries. \\
\hline
{\em subsettype} & \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} The type of subset in \{P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-B\-L\-O\-C\-K\-E\-N\-T\-R\-I\-E\-S, P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-A\-R\-R\-A\-Y\-E\-N\-T\-R\-I\-E\-S\}\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
0 if success, or an error message otherwise. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\hypertarget{poski__MatrixHandler_8c_a0bb61e92865622b43330c5e06760aa33}{\index{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c@{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c}!poski\-\_\-\-Get\-Mat\-Subset@{poski\-\_\-\-Get\-Mat\-Subset}}
